trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.CloudBlobClient</codeEntityReference> class using the specified Blob service endpoint and anonymous credentials.
trans-unit.target: Initializes a new instance of the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.CloudBlobClient</codeEntityReference> class using the specified Blob service endpoint and anonymous credentials.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Uri</codeEntityReference> object containing the Blob service endpoint to use to create the client.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Uri</codeEntityReference> object containing the Blob service endpoint to use to create the client.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.CloudBlobClient</codeEntityReference> class using the specified Blob service endpoint and account credentials.
trans-unit.target: Initializes a new instance of the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.CloudBlobClient</codeEntityReference> class using the specified Blob service endpoint and account credentials.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Uri</codeEntityReference> object containing the Blob service endpoint to use to create the client.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Uri</codeEntityReference> object containing the Blob service endpoint to use to create the client.
